Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Join our con chair, Nuri Gocay, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend. You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, ,Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System

Subject: KEYNOTE: The Camera Panopticon
Description: The Matrix got it backwards: we don’t live in a simulation controlled from a tangible world, we live in a tangible world that is increasingly being controlled by simulations. But what does this mean for our future? How does technology affect human rights and democracy, and vice-versa? Aral embarks on a journey through algorithms and surveillance to reveal how the friendly façade of ‘free’ service providers like Google and Facebook belie a darker underbelly.  Speakers include:Aral Balkan - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Guest of Honor Social Hour
Description: Get to know our Guests of Honor as we all get together for some cocktails. Meet us in the bar!  Speakers include:Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, ,Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: What Do Your Users Really Think?
Description: User testing is becoming easier and easier to do for prototypes, ideas, software and websites, and can help you make a better product. Learn about some of the easy ways to get real user opinions to help make your designs more usable and useful. We will explore both free and pay sites, as well as offline techniques.  Speakers include:Lana Krolikowski, Aral Balkan - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Independent SW/HW: Bucking Big Industry for Fun and Profit
Description: Sure, there are juggernauts in software and hardware industry, but if you want to do it yourself, what kinds of challenges are you going to run into? Come listen to our panelists talk about their experiences with going against the grain as independent software and hardware producers.   Speakers include:Aral Balkan, Ed Mason, Jason Kridner - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description: As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System
